news.title: USA Rare Earth shares jump 20% as Commerce Department takes equity stake
news.summary: The capital infusion will help USA Rare Earth advance its plan for a magnet manufacturing plant and a mine at a rare earth deposit in Texas called Round Top.

news.title: Alex Pretti killing: Minnesota CEOs, including UnitedHealth, Target, call for 'immediate deescalation'
news.summary: The Trump administration has surged federal law enforcement to the city. The move is to enforce its immigration crackdown and pursue allegations of widespread welfare fraud.

news.title: CoreWeave stock jumps 10% as Nvidia invests $2 billion to expand AI data center capacity
news.summary: No description available. No description available for this model. For more information on this model, please visit: www.cruiseworld.com/cruisemodel.

news.title: Nvidia set to supplant Apple as TSMC's top customer, signaling chip industry's 'changing dynamic'
news.summary: The positional swap will mark a fundamental shift in the semiconductor industry. The move reflects Nvidia's growing importance amid the AI infrastructure buildout.

news.title: Memory chip shortage to last through 2027, semiconductor boss says
news.summary: The boom in AI data center building has caused a shortage of memory chips. The memory chips are also crucial for electronics like smartphones. The shortage is expected to last for at least a year.

news.title: The market has cooled on tech. These are the trades to make now, says this strategist.
news.summary: Microsoft, Apple and Apple have options to play Meta, Microsoft and Apple says Evercore ISI. Use options to game Meta,Microsoft and Apple is a popular way to play the game, Evercore says.

news.title: Trump administration partners with another rare-earth company. Should you buy the stock?
news.summary: USA Rare Earth’s stock soars after a partnership with the Trump administration. The partnership gives the rare-earth company access to $1.6 billion in funding.

news.title: Here’s what investors want even more than a Fed interest-rate cut this week
news.summary: Investors are rotating out of tech stocks and into other sectors of the market. The U.S. economy chugs along, and tech stocks are among the best-performing sectors.

news.title: Michael Burry says Japanese yen recovery is a risk to U.S. stocks
news.summary: The Big Short investor Michael Burry says the Japanese yen is due a reversal. A so-called “rate check’ stirred debate over whether an appreciation in the Asian currency’s country would bleed over into U.S. stocks.

news.title: Tax refunds could be much bigger this year. But is that really a good thing?
news.summary: Bank of America economist: Americans could see an extra $100 billion in tax refunds this year. Bank of America: Tax refunds could rise to $1.2 trillion.
